description.full: THE THRILL OF THE HUNT!  Engage in an action-packed traditional hunting adventure. Use real-life hunting skills to track trophy animals across beautiful destinations. True adventure awaits.  - More than 25 different game animals including bear, elk, deer, turkey and moose.  - 26 firearms including rifles, shotguns and handguns.  - Call in and ambush your prey using authentic calls, lures, scents, stands and blinds.
